climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: SHEET SETS FOR ALL SIZES: 4-Piece Full Sheet Set includes 1 Full Deep Pocket Fitted Sheet (54” x 75” x 15”), 1 Full Flat Sheet (81” x 96”), and 2 Standard Pillowcases (20 x 27").

EASY FIT/360-DEGREE ELASTIC: Deep-pocket fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 15 inches deep, which is a universal size for most mattresses. All-around elastic provides a snug fit around your mattress to prevent slipping during restless sleep.

A NATURAL CHOICE: Crafted from European flax, natural linen sheets are recyclable and eco-friendly. Linen bedding is breathable, moisture-wicking, and naturally temperature regulating, meaning perfect comfort for both warm and cool sleepers year-round.

SOFT & DURABLE: Linen Sheets have a light, luxurious feel, yet they are strong and durable. The texture will become softer to the touch and will develop a glossiness or sheen over time as you wash them. Bare Home’s Linen Sheet Sets are OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certified free of toxic chemicals making them skin-friendly.
REST ASSURED: Our Full Size Linen Sheet Set is a great value, so your first 30 nights are on us. If you don’t love your new bedding, contact our live customer service team and we’ll make it right.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BARE HOME Linen Sheet Set DETOX YOUR SLEEP WITH BEDDING MADE WITHOUT HARMFUL CHEMICALS AND DYES. THAT’S THE BARE STANDARD (OEKO-TEX Certified: 17.HIN.19936, 2022).

CLASSIC COMFORT Experience the Lived-in Softness of Linen Linen gets softer with time and develops a luxurious sheen the more you wash it. Both beautiful and durable, it’s known for its signature rumpled texture. Linen is also breathable and moisture absorbent, keeping you cool and comfortable all night long.
Available in a Variety of Colors Natural Indigo

Previous page HYPOALLERGENIC & NON-TOXIC Perfect for sensitive sleepers, our bedding is made without harmful chemicals and dyes. SNUG & SECURE FIT 360-Degree elastic on fitted sheet hugs your mattress tightly to prevent slipping. EASY CARE Machine wash cold on a gentle cycle, and tumble dry low. Do not bleach. Warm iron if needed. Next page 1 HYPOALLERGENIC 2 SNUG & SECURE 3 EASY CARE

ARE THEY FADE RESISTANT? YES, THEY ARE MADE WITH FADE-RESISTANT DYES. IS THE FINISH SUPPOSED TO BE MATTE? OR WILL IT HAVE A SHEEN TO IT? LINEN STARTS OUT WITH A MATTE FINISH AND DEVELOPS ITS SIGNATURE SHEEN OVER TIME. DO I NEED TO WASH BEFORE USING? YES, PLEASE WASH TO SHRINK BEFORE FIRST USE. WILL IT WRINKLE? WE LOVE THE RUFFLED TEXTURE OF NATURAL LINEN AND THINK YOU WILL TOO. BUT IF YOU WISH, YOU CAN WARM IRON AS NEEDED.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, light and luxurious
reviews.reviewText: We have been shopping for a good set of linen sheets for years, but have avoided buying any mostly due to the price, and a hesitancy to buy sheets that you cannot feel before purchasing. When we saw these on a Black Friday deal, we decided to take the plunge and we are happy we did. The package seemed small for our set (Cal King - a hard size to find), but they were just very well packed. Before placing them on the bed, we washed and dried them twice, using the delicate cycle (cold) for the wash and for the dryer. Since I was concerned about the lint, I washed the top sheet and one pillowcase in one load and the fitted sheet with a pillowcase in the other. Turned out to be a good idea because the lint filter was FULL at the end of the first washing, and for the second one as well. We have washed them several times since, and the lint volume has decreased significantly. They fit on our mattress (11-inch), but they look like they could fir a thicker mattress. Seams and hems are solid, and we have not noticed any shrinkage. They are comfy in hot and cold temperatures. We will be watching to buy another set. (Note: we got the natural color, so we cannot comment on the colored sets)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality linen
reviews.reviewText: the feel of linen is amazing the size is a few inches larger for our full size bed we had to use elastic straps to maintain the sheets tight to our mattress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I didn’t know how that I could be more excited to go to bed than I already was.
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know how to explain to you how much I love these sheets. I made the switch from synthetic sheets to these as a health/ eco conscious choice. I received them and they felt hefty in the bag, much more promising than the “bamboo” sheets I ordered previously. I gave them a wash and a light tumble dry before putting on the bed and they are quite soft! Not annoyingly soft like microfiber, but pleasant. I used to enjoy “cooling” sheets because I am a hot sleeper and was a little disappointed that these feel very neutral to the touch. But after one night I realized that these allow air flow so I am not trapped in a hot pocket. It has minimized the amount of tossing and turning I do at night to escape hot spots. I didn’t think buying new sheets would be life changing, but if you’re seeking new sheets I highly recommend giving these a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best sheets we own
reviews.reviewText: We have bought lots of sheets in our 24 years of owning a home and these are the best yet. So comfortable, great quality, breathable and we sleep more soundly as well! Buying two more sets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A different soft
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these sheets. As soon as they arrived I washed them in my Dirty labs laundry detergent, so there was no residue left behind in them. They went on great and hemmed all the way around, so they really stay on. When I first laid in them they felt very different from Egyptian cotton. They felt soft but textured. I wasn’t sure if they would feel scratchy. I woke up and felt amazing. They felt so good all night. I slept through the whole night. They just have this comforting feel about them. Like their grounded. I couldn’t wait to go to sleep again they felt so good. I’m buying them for everyone in my family. I don’t know how they will resist stains but I’m not really concerned. As far as wrinkle free… they are linen. I don’t think anything linen is wrinkle free. They stretch out nice though and stay put because of them hemming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Started out great, then the worst!!
reviews.reviewText: I was so hopeful for these sheets. My mattress is 16” deep because we have a standard mattress + a 4” memory foam topper that we love. Hence it’s always a bit hard to find sheets that fit properly. Originally got these sheets and they were rough. I always wash anything i buy before is wear or use it because you never know what it’s been through. After the first wash it was so soft and amazing. We loved it! We used it in our King bed for a few days, then is started getting loose and every night/morning it would come undone. My worst nightmare. It’s so frustrating. Still soft but now annoying to deal with. Having to get up and keep fixing it and adjusting it back over the mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted some old fashioned PURE Linen sheets as they are Healthier to sleep on. These are very nice quality. When I have saved up some more money (yes they Are expensive) I’m going to order more, and may even get some for a couple family members for Christmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These sheets are amazing!
reviews.reviewText: We've never owned linin sheets before and hesitated due to cost. Pulled the trigger and bought an extra set of pillowcases. Washed it all before sleeping on them. Best night sleep I've had forever. Hardly moved and I normally am a flipper and flopper. Sounds wierd to say, but sleeping on these sheets felt very healing. Absolutely adore them and will buy more before price goes up. Best price and most highly rated to save anyone time on pulling the trigger. Get them! You won't regret it.
Lovely sheets. Generous size. Softens with washing.

I've had linen sheets from Muji before, but I decided to invest in a well-reviewed set for the future. I am SO glad I did. Bare Home's linen sheets are the best bedding I have ever owned.I have eczema and sleep on the hotter side, so it was really important to me to have sheets that are hypoallergenic, made of natural material, and that didn't trap heat like cotton. These sheets did just that.I am very pleased with the durability, quality, and texture of these sheets. When they arrived, I was cautious since some of the reviews mentioned a rough texture. But having tried other linen sheets in the past, I can attest that the quality and texture of Bare Home's linen is at a premium.They give the best value, being a bit on the pricier side, but an affordable investment for hot sleepers and other sensitive-skin folks.Do yourself a favour and buy them. No regrets!

reviews.reviewTitle: Zero stars. Extremely disappointed. *NOT real linen at all.
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to purchase these, and waited weeks for them to arrive, but was crushed when they turned out to be some strange polyester type fabric.I’ve never had flax linen bedding before, but have bought and worn many pieces of linen fabric clothing, and this isn’t even a close replica.Will be returning. Extremely disappointed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful sheets for a good price
reviews.reviewText: These are lovely sheets, and very well made. I recently read about why linen sheets are so wonderful. They do not hold a static charge like synthetic fabrics do, which allows for a more restful sleep. Cotton sheets are nice, but have always been too hot for me. Linen keeps you cool. I intend to buy another set.

I would gladly give a 5 star review.... IF... the pillowcases actually fit my pillows.... I'm not sure what size these are?? I only have standard size pillows, and these cases are not long enough.... Looks horrible 😞
